Literature.Title: Enhanced cell selectivity of hybrid peptides with potential antimicrobial activity and immunomodulatory effect.
Literature.Author: Miao X, et al.

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Mouse erythrocytes:<10% Hemolysis=250 µM,Mouse erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=500 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(IC50=43.6µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa 8600(MIC=8µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=4µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=64µg/ml)
